eu_initiatives: Digital single market for transportation. Ride-hailing, taxi and similar transportation frameworks.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
German Association of Startups 
The German Business Travel Association - VDR 
Global Business Travel Association (GBTA)

ACRISS - The Association of Car Rental Industry System Standards
goals__remit: Blacklane is the premium mobility provider. The company covers the first and last miles and feet of your journey. We provide peace of mind in more than 50 countries and 260 cities with chauffeured rides and in 500 airports with airport concierge services and lounge access.
relevant_communication:
In September 2014, Blacklane hosted an event called Mobility in Transition to bring regulators, transportation startups and the taxi industry together to discuss regulations and the future of mobility in Germany. 
 
We also participated in the Tech Open Air event in Berlin in 2015, with Uber and moovel, about transportation regulations in Europe.
